fields.request: Manual QA: Validate switch-role --repair restores node configuration
fields.request_details:
1. On a test node configured for the Terminal role, temporarily delete locks/celery.lck and change locks/nginx_mode.lck to the value `public`.
2. Confirm locks/auto_upgrade.lck exists with the expected channel (for example `stable`) so the repair run can reapply the upgrade scheduler.
3. Execute `./switch-role.sh --repair` from the deployment root and wait for the script to finish.
4. Verify the script reports "Repair completed for the Terminal role." and that locks/nginx_mode.lck has been restored to `internal`, locks/celery.lck has been recreated, and locks/auto_upgrade.lck still contains the expected channel.
5. Open the Upgrade Report in the Django admin (System â†’ Upgrade Report) and confirm no repair warnings appear and the auto-upgrade schedule loads successfully after the repair run.
